name: Truck Truck Go!
description:
Pseudo-3D game with a top-down view where 2 cats drive water supply trucks through the desert. Each player must try to destroy the other truck with weaponry, or by gaining a considerable lead.

Game design, art, programming, and other important stuff:
Kasper Lind Sørensen @goibon
Thomas Springborg
David Skødt Lauritsen
Gustav Jansson @sirGustav

Explosion sound by: Michel Baradari
http://opengameart.org/content/2-high-quality-expl...

Music by: Kevin MacLeod
https://incompetech.com/music/royalty-free/index.h...

Source and stuff:
https://github.com/madeso/ngj16-truckgame
